title: Welcome to Exodus
description:
Exodus is a no-wipe server (Oct 2021) with high rates.

**Premium Benefits:**
- Max LT +5000
- Knowledge Chance +100%
- Combat/Skill/Life EXP +200%
- **Monster AP +60** (Essential for end-game)
- Drop Rate +50%

**QoL Features:**
- Infinite Potions easier to obtain.
- Free T4 Pets (Weight), T4 Fairy, T8 Horse via Challenge [Y] tab.
- Agris consumes 1 point per mob.
- Pointless drops (Black Shards, Specters) removed.

title: 5-Minute Leveling Guide (1-73)
description:
1. **Start:** Complete 'The Start of an Adventure' from Black Spirit.
2. **WARNING:** Do **NOT** take the 'Exodus Instant level 49' quest yet!
3. **Grind:** Manually grind to lvl 50. Complete '[To Level 50!] Go Beyond Your Limits'.
4. **Grind:** Continue to lvl 61-63 manually.
5. **Instant Jump:** NOW take 'Exodus Instant level 49' -> Jumps to lvl 73.
6. **AFK:** Buy 'Book of Training' from Jamie Drucker in Velia to hit 99%.

title: Infinite Potions
description:
**Obtain:** Collect **Exodus Tokens** and exchange them for the Full HP/MP Potion at **Igor Bartali** in Velia.
**Upgrade:** Heat Ornette's/Odore's Spirit Essence with **Primordial Dawn** (Drop: Thornwood/Shultz) to get Hestia's Spirit Essence.

title: Flame & Ember Drop Locations
description:
**Flame/Ember of the Primordial (0.5%):** Gyfin Rhasia, Mirumok, Saunils, Desert Nagas, Thornwood, Shultz.
**Daemon Flame/Ember (0.5%):** Abandoned Monastery, Basilisk, Aakman, Fadus.
**Exalted Flame (0.05%):** All Exalted grind spots.
**Flame of Frost:** Helms (5%)
**Flame of Despair:** Rogues (5%)
**Flame of Hongik:** Iron Mine (5%)
**Flame of Resonance:** Manes (5%)

title: Recipe: Primordial Weapons
description:
Craft via **L > Manufacture**:

**Main/Awakening Weapon:**
- PEN Blackstar Weapon
- 30,000 Caphras Stones
- 1x Flame of the Primordial (Heat 100 Embers)

**Sub-Weapon:**
- PEN Blackstar Sub-Weapon
- 20,000 Caphras Stones
- 1x Flame of the Primordial

**Shai Sol:**
- PEN Artina Sol
- 100,000 Caphras
- 1x Flame of Primordial

title: Recipe: Primordial Armor
description:
Craft via **L > Manufacture**:

**Requires:**
- 1x Obliterating Fallen God Piece (Helmet/Armor/Gloves/Shoes)
- 1x Daemon Flame (Heat 100 Daemon Embers)
- 20,000 Caphras Stones

*Note: Daemon Embers drop from Fadus, Monastery, Aakman, Basilisk.*

title: Primordial Accessory Stats (Base)
description:
**Ring:** 15 AP (Monster AP +20). Drop: Saunils, Nagas.
**Earring:** 21 AP (Monster AP +20). Drop: Thornwood, Shultz.
**Belt:** 24 AP. Drop: Fadus, Monastery.
**Necklace:** 40 AP. Drop: Basilisk, Aakman.

title: Primordial & Eternal Tomes
description:
**Primordial Tome (Shultz/Gahaz/Sausans):**
- 2 Crystal Slots
- 1000% Combat EXP
- PEN: All AP +25, Accuracy +50

**Eternal Tome (Gyfin Rhasia):**
- 2 Crystal Slots
- 1000% Combat EXP
- PEN: All DP +40, Evasion +70, DR +40

title: Primordial Cup Recipes
description:
**Cup of Alastor (Necklace):** 1x Primordial Dusk + 2000 Heart of Arid Forest (Iron Mine).
**Cup of Aethon (Earring):** 1x Primordial Dusk + 2000 Shard of Drained Night (Helms).
**Cup of Nyctaeus (Belt):** 1x Primordial Dusk + 2000 Shard of Furious Night (Rogues).
**Cup of Orphnaeus (Ring):** 1x Primordial Dusk + 2000 Shard of Tearful Night (Manes).

title: Beginner PVE Spots
description:
**Polly's Forest:** SP/EXP.
**Tshira Ruins:** Caphras.
**Marie Cave:** Memory Fragments.
**Mediah (Helms/Rogues/Manes):** Accessory Cups & Snowflakes.
**Exchange:** Trade Snowflakes at Igor Bartali for Manos Gear or GM Ork for Black Stones.

title: Recipe: Exalted Armor
description:
Craft via **L > Manufacture**:

**Requires:**
- 1x PEN Primordial Armor Piece
- 1x Primordial Dawnstone (Heat 5x Primordial Twilight)
- 1x Exalted Flame
- 500,000 Caphras Stones

*Primordial Twilight drops from All Tartaros zones.*

description:

**Gloves (Accuracy):** 126 DP, Acc 65, HP 150, Monster DR 30.
**Shoes (DR):** 131 DP, DR 73(+95), HP 150, Monster DR 30.
**Shoes (Evasion):** 129 DP, Eva 87(+94), HP 150, Monster DR 30.

**Damnation (Ronaros):** Eva +60, Resist -80, DR -80.

*Recipe:* 100x Stone + 200x Crystallized Despair.

title: Sub-Weapon Reform Stats
description:

**Isolation (Protty):** Eva +65, Special Eva +20%.

**Eternal (Ronaros):** DR +100, HP +400.

*Recipe:* 50x Stone A + 50x Stone B + 200x Despair.

title: Alchemy Stone Upgrades
description:
**Primordial Vell's:** Vell's Heart + Exalted Soul + 500k Caphras + Garmoth Heart + 200 Latent Aura.
**Exalted Vell's:** Vell's Heart + Exalted Soul + 500k Caphras + Garmoth Heart + 1x Savage Heart (RBF/NW).
**Gaia's Khan Heart:** Khan's Magic + Exalted Soul + 500k Caphras + Garmoth Heart + Protection Stone.

*Exalted Soul Fragment Recipe:* 500x Crystallized Despair + 50k Magical Shards + 50k Alchemy Stone Shards.

**NOV (IX) -> DEC (X):** 1,000 - 2,000 FS

*Note: Use Advice of Valks up to +2000. Silver comes from grinding Sycraia.*

title: More Custom Crystal Stats
description:
**Hade's Glory (Sub-Wep):** Crit Hit +10%, All AP +8.
**Glorious Crystal of Ah'krad (Awk):** Acc +3, Monster AP +7, Atk/Cast Speed +1%.
**Medusa's Ultimate Set (2/4):**
- *Hoom:* DR +5, HP +150, Eva +4, Acc +8, Resist +3%.
- *Macalod:* AP +5, Stam +100, Acc +4, Combat EXP +5%.

title: Unique Boss/Spot Drops
description:
**Hexe Shoulder Ornament:** 100 Monster AP (Hexe Sanctuary).
**Searing Heart Piece:** (Jurassic Canyon).
**Demeter's Resistance Crystal:** (Olun's Valley).
**Origin of Dark Hunger:** (Hexe Sanctuary).

title: Exchange: Ibedor's Scroll
description:
Exchange **5x Venomous Night Fangs** at **[GM] Ork** to receive **1x Ibedor's Scroll**.
*Use at Crypt of Resting Thoughts.*

title: Item: Medusa's Sea Crystal
description:
**Stats:** Speed/Accel/Turn/Brake +20%, Weight +12,000LT, Durability +20,000, Sea Monster Dmg x10,000.
**Obtain:** Trade 50x [Level 5] Barter Items to Igor Bartali.

title: Exchange: Igor Bartali (Snowflakes)
description:
**50x:** Remnants of the Rift
**100x:** Manos Clothes (Cook/Alch/etc) / Rare Courser Box / Manos Tool
**1000x:** Mythical Censer
**500x:** Elixir Beginner Box
**10x:** Lara's Tea / Magical Elixir / Stonetail Fodder

title: Exchange: Seal of the Undying
description:
**1000x:** Advice of Valks (+500)
**200x:** Exodus Dream Box
**10x:** J's Special Scroll
**1x:** Item Collection Scroll (60 min)
**500x:** Titles (Relentless Slayer, etc.)

title: Exchange: Exalted Stones
description: Exchange **1x Exalted Stone** (Fire/Water/Aura/etc.) for **1x Mass of Pure Magic Bundle**.
footer: Source: Exalted Weapon Reform Stone Exchange

title: Life Skill Mastery
description:
The new maximum mastery bracket is **6000**.
**Effect (at 6000):**
- Basic/Special/Rare Drop Rate: **+500%**
- Basic/Special/Rare Quantity: **+500%**

title: Recipe: Ultimate Gaia's Clothes
description:
**Effect:** Combines effects of all 4 Gaia Life Clothes.
**Recipe:** Manufacture (L)
- PEN Gaia Craftsman's Clothes
- PEN Gaia Hunter's Clothes
- PEN Gaia Sailor's Clothes
- PEN Gaia Gatherer's Clothes
- 1,000,000 Caphras Stones

title: Item: Gaia's Fishing Rod
description:
**Stats:** 1000 Mastery (at PEN), +10% Big Fish Rate, -20% Auto-Fish Time.
**Recipe:** +10 Balenos Rod + 20k Caphras + 5k Conc. Black Gems.

title: Item: Gaia's Matchlock
description:
**Stats:** 1000 Mastery (at PEN), 12k Damage, +10% Crit, +10% Reload Speed.
**Recipe:** +10 Master Matchlock + 20k Caphras + 5k Conc. Black Gems.

title: Item: Gaia's Riding Crop
description:
**Stats:** 1000 Mastery.
**Recipe:** PEN Manos Riding Crop + 50k Caphras + 10k Conc. Black Gems.

title: Loot: Black Spirit Random Reward Box
description:
**Contents:** Combined loot table of both the Adventure PVE Box and Adventure Life Box (1-10 items).
*Obtained from Black Spirit Adventure.*

title: Loot: Margoria Open Sea (Guild)
description:
**Large/Medium/Small Goldmont Boats:**
- [Guild] Goldmont Pirate Golden Goblet (30-45)
- [Guild] Goldmont Pirate Golden Coin (30-45)
- Crow Coin Box x100 (5-35)
- Moon Vein Flax Fabric (Medium Boat only)

title: Imperial Feather Exchange Rates
description:
**Tier 1:** 1 Feather
**Tier 2:** 2 Feathers
**Tier 3:** 3 Feathers
**Tier 4:** 4 Feathers
**Tier 5:** 5 Feathers
**Tier 6:** 10 Feathers
**Tier 7:** 15 Feathers
**Tier 8:** 20 Feathers

title: Barter Mechanics
description:
- **Refresh Cost:** 1 Point per refresh.
- **Max Exchanges:** 12 Exchanges per item.
- **Bonus:** Crow Coins are buffed from exchange.

title: Title: No Death, No Problem
description:
**Requirement:** Kill 40 Gairas.
*Part of the Terraria Crossover events.*

title: Obtaining Custom Gathering Tools
description:
High durability tools are available via:
1. **Loyalty Store**
2. **Witch's Delicacy Exchange**
3. **Mysterious Catalyst Exchange** (at Fughar)
*Note: Exchange broken tools at Fughar [GM Ork].*

title: More Terraria Titles
description:
**Hardmode Herald:** Kill 50 Indomitable Golems.
**99% Fishing, 1% Fighting:** Fish 8 Plump Pufferfish.
**Died to a Slime (Again):** Kill 25 Voraros.
**No Death, No Problem:** Kill 40 Gairas.

title: Exchange: Resplendent Medal of Honor
description:
**1x:** Gold Bar 10,000G (100 Billion)
**200x:** Splendid Alchemy Stone of Destruction
**200x:** Splendid Alchemy Stone of Protection
**200x:** Splendid Alchemy Stone of Life

title: Siege Title Rewards (Weekly)
description:

**Ultimate Weapon:** 18000 Currency
